description: Office furniture purchase for several Product Categories
full_summary:
### PSIB: SA Office Furnishings - Categories 1, 2 & 6

#### Tender Information

*   **Reference Number**: cb-904-41464221
*   **Solicitation Number**: W0103-249694
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-15T17:00:00
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-12-04
*   **Modification Date**: 2023-12-15

#### Tender Description

Amendment 001

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to the Pacific Region, specifically in Victoria, British Columbia.

This tender is part of the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. The tender is also set aside from international trade agreements under the provision for set-asides for small and minority businesses.

The bid solicitation document, available for download, includes information on the security requirement associated with this tender.

Key Requirements:

*   Interconnecting panels and freestanding systems (Product Category 1)
*   Freestanding height-adjustable desk/table products (Product Category 2)
*   Support space – collaborative furniture (Product Category 6)
*   Delivery and installation of office furniture to Victoria, British Columbia
*   Security requirement (consult the bid solicitation document for additional information)

#### Tender Status and Additional Information

The tender status is Expired. However, the tender description and other relevant information remain available.

#### Contact Information

*   Justin Malchow, Department of National Defence
*   Phone: (236) 464-6737
*   Email: Justin.Malchow@forces.gc.ca
*   Address: CFB Esquimalt, Victoria, BC V9A 7N2, Canada

#### Supporting Documents

The following documents are available for download:

*   [Application for Registration](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26619/application-for-registration-%28471-e.pdf)
*   [Amendment 001: RFx W0103-249694](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26619/en_amendment-001_rfb_w0103-249694.pdf)
*   [Guidance on How to Complete the Application for Registration Form](https://canadabuys.can
